alert.note: Alert for Holmes; North Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 4:11PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Geneva, north central Walton and northwestern Holmes Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 311 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Samson, or 10 miles east of Florala, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Geneva, Samson, Coffee Springs, Earlytown, Hacoda, Pera, Chancellor, Spears, Gaskin, Eunola, Weeks, Sellersville, Lytle, Darlington, Marl, Logan Field Municipal A/P, Sweetgum Head, Royals Crossroads, Geneva Municipal A/P and Vaughanville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
